name: Heatmor
author: Oswaldo KATO
flavor_text: A flame serves as its tongue, melting through the hard shell of Durant so that Heatmor can devour their insides.

attacks.name: Flame Cloak
attacks.effect: Attach a {R} Energy card from your discard pile to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Exciting Flame
attacks.effect: If this Pokémon has at least 3 extra Energy attached (in addition to this attack’s cost), this attack also does 180 damage to 1 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
